entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:49 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH ENDED, Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:50 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 1:18 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: S 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
